bundle.bundle-description: Native driver for linux javax.comm using the RXTX library. Note that this bundle is LGPL and contains full source to rxtx
Monitors a file system directory for bundles to deploy
The Apache Xerces2 Java XML parser
Native driver for win32 javax.comm using Sun's COMM library
OBR bundle repository using the KF console and desktop
XML format support for CM and Metatype
Framework tray icon. Allows basic control of the framework using the windows system tray. (IMPL)
Apache Commons logging. Publishced under Apache License. See http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
Jini driver (experimental) using Sun's jini impl. jini-core.jar and jini-ext.jar, see http://wwws.sun.com/software/jini/licensing/SCSL3_JiniTSA1.html
SSL Provider using the J2 security architecture. (IMPL)
OSGi IO http, socket and datagram-receive Connectors (IMPL)
Grunt, the JUnit test runner. Runs JUnit tests registered in the framework and dumps results to XML files.
Windows Tray Icon manager. Uses code written by Jan Struyf, jan.struyf@cs.kuleuven.ac.be, http://jeans.studentenweb.org/java/trayicon/trayicon.html
Compatability layer for bundles using the Oscar shell API. See readme.txt for details.
